  • 3.1.1. Usage

3.1.1. Usage

3.1.1.1. Installation

OPTIONAL: Install the JEDI fv3-bundle and IODA converters if you will be modifying, otherwise use the default installation. Note: For tests to pass, you must have the same version that Clara has on hera.

3.1.1.2. Create links to JEDI files:

cd jedi/fv3-jedi/Data make_links.sh [ path-to-jedi-fv3-bundle-build ]
cd ../../ioda make_links.sh [ path-to-jedi-ioda-bundle-src ] cd ../../../

3.1.1.3. Fetch submodules:

git submodule update --init

3.1.1.4. Compile directories

cd add_jedi_incr build.sh cd .. cd IMS_proc/ build.sh cd ..

3.1.1.5. Running

Edit settings file, edit submit_landDA.sh (your account details, your settings file)

sbatch submit_landDA.sh
